#include <iostream>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

int main() {
    int t;
    cin >> t;
    for(int i=0;i<t;i++){
        string a,b;
        cin >> a >> b;
        int count=0;
        int j=0;
        for(int i=0;i<b.length(),j<a.length();i++,j++){
            if(a[j]!=b[i]){
                count++;
                if(count==1){
                    i--;
                }
                else{
                    break;
                }
                
            }
        }
        if(count==1){
            cout << 1 << endl;
        }
        else{
            cout << 0 << endl;
        }
    }
	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
